Languages.string: plus the language spoken by the noctini's fext master

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The noctiny has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Pact Wrath
MonsterTrait.Text: One of the noctiny's weapons is infused with power. Its attacks with this weapon count as magical, and it adds its Charisma bonus to the weapon's damage (included below).

MonsterTrait.Name: Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: The noctiny is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability score is Charisma (save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following warlock spells. Cantrips (at will): chill touch, eldritch blast, poison spray 1st level (4 slots): armor of agathys, charm person, hellish rebuke, hex 2nd level (2 slots): crown of madness, misty step

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The noctiny makes two melee attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Pact Staff
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage or 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage if used in two hands.
